ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 35
ygData.msgSnippet: I think this sounds like a great location for it.  The other bazaars have happened on Sunday afternoon, why not continue with that trend.  I personaly cant
ygData.messageBody:
I think this sounds like a great location for it. The other "bazaars" have
happened on Sunday afternoon, why not continue with that trend. I personaly
cant make the Sat time, but would be there every Sunday if it was held then.
Just my 2 cents.....

Sleel / Kyrel / Kryss / Twyp / Krakk / Kragz
(ya ya... way too many guys i know)


In a message dated 6/7/99 1:40:50 AM Pacific Daylight Time,
Bristlebane_EQ@onelist.com writes:

> i would like to suggest a weekly trade festival at the swanky
swashbuckler's
> cave. (it is located in east commons, with an entrance to it also from
north
>
> ro) i think that this would be a great place for players to bring thier
rare
>
> or hand made items and try and sell or trade them. looking to sell that
> rare polished tomahawk, or that hand made high quality bow? looking to
find
> a smith selling banded armor, or trying to find that peice of bronze plate
> that you are missing? just found some rubicite armor and want to fetch a
top
>
> price for it? i think that this game is already awesome, but we can make
it
> better with weekly events like this, or other events. i suggest it be held
> every saturday at 3PM EST.
